abstract: The extra patent protection of the profitable drug Enbrel, a rheumatoid arthritis and psoriasis treatment, could keep a cheaper version off the market until 2028.
snippet: The extra patent protection of the profitable drug Enbrel, a rheumatoid arthritis and psoriasis treatment, could keep a cheaper version off the market until 2028.
lead_paragraph: Amgen said Tuesday that a new patent had been granted that could protect its big-selling drug Enbrel from generic competition for 17 more years, a development that could undermine some of the savings contemplated in the federal health care legislation.

headline.main: Patent for Amgen Drug May Undercut Health Care Plan
headline.print_headline: Patent for Amgen Drug May Undercut Health Care Plan

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
